body.content:
Dear Friend,

My name is Andrew Smith, I am a manager of a  global security company back
In Ghana,  I have a very lucrative transaction, which can be done One Touch
without delay,  A boy who his father left an inheritance and he is the only
child died early this year and no one has access to this inheritance and I
am the only one who knows in and out of the history of this inheritance,
there is no more hair to this inheritance and it was to move out of the
country, all the documents are ready well prepared, but can I trust this in
your hands and if you are interested, step forward with your phone
number---- and  residential address, A copy of your identification  and we
can proceed the delivery to you, only thing is just to get a change of
ownership to your name and the company will see that it has been move,
there will be no more issues and problem, Kindly respond back urgently and
i promise you, that you have nothing to worry about  and the attached
document  is the late boy Identification  and the document .


GLOBAL SECURITY COMPANY
Officer in Charge:
Mr Patrick Smith
